using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.NewTypes.Input
{
	public class InheritanceAsync
	{
		public virtual Task ReadAsync()
		{
			return Task.CompletedTask;
			
		}

		public bool SyncMethod()
		{
			return true;
		}
	}

	/// <summary>
	/// Derives from <see cref="InheritanceAsync"/>
	/// </summary>
	public class DerivedAsync : InheritanceAsync
	{
		private Type _baseType;

		public DerivedAsync()
		{
			_baseType = typeof(InheritanceAsync);
		}

		public override Task ReadAsync()
		{
			try
			{
				if (SyncMethod())
				{
					return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
				}
				else
				{
					return Read2Async();
				}
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				return Task.FromException<object>(ex);
			}
		}

		public Task Read2Async()
		{
			return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
		}
	}
}
